1311:2: samāsato dvividhañca prahāṇaṃ dvividhañca jñānaṃ bodhirityucyate|
1311:4: dvividhaṃ punarjñānaṃ yat kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇācca nirmalaṃ sarvakleśaniranubandhajñānam|
1311:9: tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sarvataścātyantañca prahāṇādyad jñānaṃ tacchuddhamityucyate|
1311:10: sarvadhātuṣu sarvavastuṣu sarvaprakāreṣu sarvakāleṣu yadjñānamavyāhataṃ pravartate tatsarvajñānamityucyate|
1311:15: tasyaiva ca saṃkṛtāsaṃskṛtasya vastuno'pramāṇaḥ prakārabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇottarajātiprabhedena sāmānyalakṣaṇaprabhedena hetuphalaprabhedena dhātugatikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtādiprabhedena|
1311:18: ityetatsarvadhātukaṃ sarvavastukaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvakālaṃ jñānaṃ sarvajñānamityucyate|
1311:19: tatrāsaṅgajñānaṃ yadābhogamātrādeva sarvatrādhiṣṭhitaṃ tvaritamasaktaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate|
1311:20: na punaḥ punarābhogaṃ kurvato nānyatraikābhogapratibaddhameva tajjñānaṃ bhavati|
1311:22: catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ yā ca tathāgatasyāraṇā praṇidhijñānaṃ pratisaṃvidaśca|
1311:25: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṃṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣyāṇi mahākaruṇā'sammoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvākāravarajñānañca|
1311:27: tatreyaṃ paramā bodhiḥ saptabhiḥ paramatābhiryuktā yeneyaṃ sarvabodhīnāṃ parametyucyate|
1311:28: sapta paramatāḥ katamāḥ āśrayaparamatā pratipattiparamatā sampattiparamatā jñānaparamatā prabhāvaparamatā prahāṇaparamatā vihāraparamatā ca|
1311:31: yattathāgata ātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya [bahujanasukhāya] lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pratipannaḥ|
1311:33: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ śīlasaṃpattyā dṛṣṭisaṃpattyā ācārasaṃpattyā ājīvasaṃpattyā [ pratipannaḥ]|
1311:35: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ dharmapratisaṃvidā'rthapratisaṃvidā niruktipratisaṃvidapratibhānapratisaṃvidā ca|
1311:37: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiḥ ṣaḍbhirabhijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭābhiḥ|
1311:39: yattathāgataḥ savāsanasarvakleśaprahāṇena niruttareṇāpratisamena jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇena ca samanvāgataḥ|
1311:49: brāhmādvihārātkaruṇāvihāro yena tathāgatastriskṛto rātrau triskṛtvo divase ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivena buddhacakṣaṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate ko vardhate kasyānutpannāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayāmi kvaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgraphale'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti|
1311:57: teṣāñca punastathāgatānāṃ daśabhirākārairguṇābhidhānañca bhavati guṇānusmaraṇatā ca|
1311:59: ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhansamyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti|
1311:66: paramacittadamopāyajñatayā ekasyaiva loke puruṣabhūtasya ca prādurbhāvāt anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ|
1311:67: cakṣurbhūtatvājjñānārthadharmatattva bhūtatvād vyaktasyārthasya nirṇetṛtvāt sarvārthapratisaraṇatvādavyutpannasyārthasya vyutpādakatvā dutpannasya saṃśayasyocchedakatvāt gambhīrāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ vivaraṇāt paryavadāpakatvāttanmūlatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ tannetṛkatvāttatpratisaraṇatvāt sarvaduḥkhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ śāsti vyapadiśati samyagdevamanuṣyāṇām|
1311:69: arthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeranarthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśernnaivārthopasaṃhitasya nānārthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeḥ sakalasarvākārābhisaṃbodhād buddha ityucyate|
1311:71: tatra prabhūtairapi kalpairekasyāpi buddhasya prādurbhāvo na bhavati|
1311:72: ekasminneva ca kalpe prabhūtānāṃ buddhānāmutpādo bhavati|
1311:73: teṣu teṣu ca daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣvaprameyāṇāmeva buddhānāmutpādo veditavyaḥ|
1311:76: yasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare ekena bodhisattvena bodhau cittaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare sarvaiḥ|
1311:77: yathā caika utsahito ghaṭito vyāyacchitaśca tathā sarve|
1311:78: tathāhi dṛśyante'sminneva lokadhātāvanekāni bodhisattvaśatāni yāni tulyakālapraṇidhānāni tulyatyāgāni tulyakṣāntikāni tulyavīryāṇi tulyadhyānāni tulyaprajñānāni|
1311:81: na ca tulyasaṃbhārasamudāgatayordvayostāvadbodhisattvayorekasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetre yugapadutpattyavakāśo'sti prāgevāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānām|
1311:84: tasmāddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu yathā pariśodhiteṣu tathāgataśūnyeṣu te tulyasaṃbhārā bodhisattvā anyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūtpadyanta iti veditavyam|
1311:85: tadanena paryāyeṇa bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabāhulyameva yujyate|
1311:89: yathāhameko'pariṇāyake loke pariṇāyakaḥ syāṃ sattvānāṃ vinetā sarvaduḥkhebhyo vimocayitā parinirvāpayiteti|
1311:90: yasyaivaṃ dīrgharātraṃ praṇidhānamanubṛṃhayataḥ samyak pratipattiparigṛhītamṛdhyatyeva tat|
1311:91: punaśca śakta ekastathāgatastrisāhasramahāsāhasre ekasmin buddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakārya kartum|
1311:92: ato dvitīyasya tathāgatasya vyartha evotpādaḥ syāt|
1311:93: bhūyaścaikasya tathāgatasya loke utpādātsattvānām evārthakaraṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā|
1311:95: teṣāmevaṃ bhavatyayameva kṛtsne jagatyekastathāgato na dvitīyaḥ|
1311:96: asmiñjanapadacārikāṃ vā viprakānte parinirvṛte vā nāsti sa kaścid dvitīyaḥ|
1311:97: yasyāsmābhirantike brahmacaryaṃ caritavyaṃ syāt dharmo vā śrotavya iti viditvā'titvarante ghanatareṇa chandavyāyāmena brahmacaryavāsāya saddharmaśravaṇāya ca|
1311:99: evameṣāmekasya buddhasyotpādātsvārthe karaṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā ca bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā ca|
1311:100: tatra sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvaṃ samasamaṃ bhavati nirviśiṣṭaṃ sthāpayitvā catvāri sthānāni-āyurnāma kulaṃ kāyañca|
1311:108: prakṛtyā ca bahukleśo duṣprajñaśca bhavati sarvo mātṛgrāmaḥ|
1311:109: na ca prakṛtyā bahukleśasantānena duṣprajñasantānena ca śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum|
1311:110: evamiyamanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ svabhāvato'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā|
1311:111: paramato'pi guṇanirdeśānusmaraṇato'pi saṃbhavato'pi viśeṣato'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā|
1311:112: api tvacintyaiva sarvatarkamārgasamatikrāntatvādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyaguṇasamuditatvādanuttaraiva ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaśrāvaka-pratyekabuddhatathāgatānābhi nirvṛttaye bhavati|
